wordGroup: clinical psychologist 临床心理学家

sentences.en: He passed himself off as a senior psychologist.
sentences.cn: 他自己冒充是一名资深心理学家。

sentences.en: They called in a psychologist to give an independent opinion.
sentences.cn: 他们征询一位心理学家的独立意见。

sentences.en: An assessment by an independent educational psychologist was essential.
sentences.cn: 由一位独立的教育心理学家做评估是至关重要的。
